title: Issues with logging on
body:
I am currently having trouble with logging into League of legends.
I have tried multiple times and I have restarted my computer.
This is really frustrating and if anyone knows what is wrong please inform me.

replies.body:
I made a post in another section (since this section is being spammed with a bot)

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/rGAr0ssj-oce-server-down-champ-select-froze

Riot are aware of the problem and are dealing with it.

> [{quoted}](name=4y5tvb8,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=7FGN7Mdj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-19T03:09:36.663+0000)
>
> I made a post in another section (since this section is being spammed with a bot)
> 
> http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/rGAr0ssj-oce-server-down-champ-select-froze
> 
> Riot are aware of the problem and are dealing with it.

oh thank you
